Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo Class Reference

Manages the information about the file being transfered. More...

 Create a new instance using information sent from the remote user in his DCC Send message.

Properties

long FileStartingPosition [get]
 Where to start reading or writing a file. Used during DCC Resume actions.
long BytesTransfered [get]
 The number of bytes sent or received so far. This Property is thread safe.
long CompleteFileSize [get]
 The length of the file. This number is either the actual size of a file being sent or the number sent in the DCC SEND request.
string DccFileName [get]
 The file's name with all spaces converted to underscores and without the path.

Detailed Description

Manages the information about the file being transfered.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo.DccFileInfo ( FileInfo  fileInfo,
long  completeFileSize 
)

Create a new instance using information sent from the remote user in his DCC Send message.

Parameters:
fileInfo The file being received
completeFileSize The size of the file being received as specified in the DCC Send request.
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo.DccFileInfo ( FileInfo  fileInfo  ) 

Create a new instance using the file information from a local file to be sent to a remote user.

Parameters:
fileInfo The local file being sent
Exceptions:
ArgumentException If the file does not already exist.
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo.DccFileInfo ( string  fileName  ) 

Create a new instance using the file information from a local file to be sent to a remote user.

Parameters:
fileName The full pathname of local file being sent
Exceptions:
ArgumentException If the file does not already exist.

Property Documentation

long Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo.BytesTransfered [get]

The number of bytes sent or received so far. This Property is thread safe.

A read-only long.

long Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo.CompleteFileSize [get]

The length of the file. This number is either the actual size of a file being sent or the number sent in the DCC SEND request.

A read-only long.

string Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo.DccFileName [get]

The file's name with all spaces converted to underscores and without the path.

A read-only string.

long Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfo.FileStartingPosition [get]

Where to start reading or writing a file. Used during DCC Resume actions.

A read-only long indicating the location within the file.
